Plot: A group of women of Indian descent take a trip together from their home in Birmingham, England to the beach resort of Blackpool. The women vary in ages from mid-teens to old, and initially ...
Title: Bhaji on the Beach
Writer: Gurinder Chadha (story), Meera Syal (story and screenplay)
Actors: Kim Vithana, Jimmi Harkishin, Sarita Khajuria, Akbar Kurtha
